title: Application of Multimedia-Based Integrated Teaching Methods for ESL Grammar Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of English Grammar and Intermediate General Vocabulary Skills
context.additional_context: Context-based grammar education utilizing basic knowledge of U.S. history and geography

learning_goals: Students can understand passive voice grammar concepts through multimedia materials and apply them in authentic contexts.
Students can convert grammatical knowledge into procedural knowledge through historical/geographical case analysis.
Students can enhance their grammatical application skills through peer feedback and interaction in online collaborative learning.

resources: Grammar worksheets based on historical/geographical context
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
